package.name: dejavu-fonts-ttf
package.install: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} mkdir -vp ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/X11/fonts/truetype ln -sf /usr/lib/X11/fonts/truetype ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/fonts/X11/truetype mkdir -vp ${TGTDIR}/etc/fonts/conf.avail mkdir -vp ${TGTDIR}/etc/fonts/conf.d install -m 0644 ttf/*.ttf ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/X11/fonts/truetype install -m 0644 fontconfig/*.conf ${TGTDIR}/etc/fonts/conf.avail/ for i in 20-unhint-small-dejavu-sans.conf 20-unhint-small-dejavu-serif.conf \ 57-dejavu-sans-mono.conf 20-unhint-small-dejavu-sans-mono.conf \ 57-dejavu-sans.conf 57-dejavu-serif.conf ; do ln -sf /etc/fonts/conf.avail/$i ${TGTDIR}/etc/fonts/conf.d/$i done
